note.p: Daughter of Philip Lake Godsal. Married John Lloyd (1811/12–65) in 1848. Sister-in-law of Mary Charlotte Lloyd (1819–96). Superintended the collection of fossil remains found in caves on the estate at Rhagatt near Corwen, Wales.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/4311/34/2)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 June 2015)
London Metropolitan Archives, St George Hanover Square, register of baptism (DL/T/089, 019 p. 78)
